user_data.target_needs: I wanted a reliable and stylish belt that would provide comfort and durability for everyday use.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a durable and high-quality belt that would withstand daily wear and tear. The reputation of the brand for toughness and longevity was a significant factor in my decision. Additionally, the positive review about the material and fit reassured me that I was making a good choice. The sizing instructions were also helpful, ensuring I selected the right size for comfort.

I wanted a versatile belt that could be adjusted for a perfect fit and offered multiple styling options. The idea of having interchangeable straps was appealing, but I was disappointed to find that there was only one buckle included. This limitation made me reconsider the value of the set, even though the quality of the belts was satisfactory.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer a combination of comfort, durability, and practicality. I value items that are well-constructed and can withstand regular use, such as shoes and clothing that maintain their shape and quality over time. I appreciate features like cushioned insoles, adjustable fits, and easy maintenance, as these enhance my overall experience. Additionally, I tend to favor products that provide good value for money, especially if they can last for several years with proper care. On the other hand, I dislike products that are poorly made or do not fit well, as well as those that lack essential features or have a short lifespan. I also find it frustrating when items do not meet my expectations in terms of quality or functionality, such as shoes that are too loose or accessories that are incomplete.

Item No.2 : Item Title: <KM Legend Men's Leather Dress Belt-Classic & Fashion for Work Business and Casual> / Item ID: B08NZVWRC6 / Price: $16.89 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Accessories', 'Belts'] / Description: ["Tired of sticking everyday to the same dressing style? Looking for a perfect match to your wardrobe? KM Legend is your perfect dress code solution! Our high quality belts are made of 100% genuine cowhide leather with zinc buckle closure. This classic and fashion KM Legend leather belts styles, were carefully selected and designed by the world-class designers of men s fine luxury goods, known for modern and upscale designs for men's clothing with the most durable, sophisticated to meet your daily needs! To make sure you look great when attending a business meeting, this belt will do its job. Its genuine leather composition, fine double edge stitching, and a durable metal buckle affirm belt's premium quality. This belt is an ideal and basic dress or uniform accessory, and goes great with casual, dressy casual or formal attire making it excellent for everyday wear or special occasions. Want to gift yourself or someone? This belt makes a perfect gift idea for your business colleague, someone you love or even your boss. How to perfectly determine your belt size? Please refer to the size chart in the last the image for the perfect fit. Belt size equals measurement in inches when measured from inner end of buckle to 3rd(the middle one out of 5 in total) hole. TIP: ORDER ONE OR TWO SIZE LARGER THAN YOUR PANT SIZE."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Timberland Men's Classic Leather Reversible Belt> / Item ID: B01N6ZA3AO / Price: $19.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Accessories', 'Belts'] / Description: ['For those working on the job site, going to the office or simply walking around town, do so in style while you wear a Timberland belt for men. This Timberland Men’s Reversible Leather Brown Black Belt is made from 100% genuine leather and has a silver single-loop buckle. This men’s leather belt can transition from a men’s jean belt but can also be converted to be worn as a mens dress belt with slacks. Manufactured with classically cut edges and a single-prong buckle, this daily men’s leather belt simply looks great, and it’s designed to last a long time. The Timberland Men’s Classic Leather Jean Belt features feathered edges and pairs well with high-quality jeans and Timberland boots Timberland products are designed to last for extended periods of frequent use. Our mens belts are made from high-quality genuine leather and stitched with precision manufacturing standards, which helps them hold up to frequent and extensive use. The durable construction and superior materials also withstand cold and hot weather alike, making this a perfect all-season work belt or casual belt. This street-worthy mens leather belt by Timberland is made to fit to your daily schedule and lifestyle comfortably. It is smooth to the touch and has a sharp and rich color. Timberland offers this men’s belts in different sizes. Looking for a mens brown belt or mens black belt we have you covered. Don’t sacrifice when looking for a leather belt for men. Our Timberland Mens belts for jeans are inspired by a rich and traditional New England heritage, and the quality they produce in each product is legendary. This genuine leather jean belt is offered in big and tall sizes and multiple colors. For a precision fit, it’s best to order it one size larger than your pants. Don’t settle with a no name mens casual belt, get the best mens belt available from a trusted brand like Timberland. Our quality and craftsmanship makes our jean belt for men the perfect belt for all men.']

Item No.3 : Item Title: <Clubbelts Men's Leather Ratchet Belt with Automatic Buckle, Black/White/Brown, 1 3/8 Wide, Adjustable Dress Belt for Men> / Item ID: B08LNBYK57 / Price: $19.88 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Accessories', 'Belts'] / Description: ['We Create Thoughtful Products That Are Worth Holding Onto.', 'Nickel zinc alloy buckle & top-grain smooth leather belt from CLUBBELTS is unlike any other. First, say goodbye to sloppy, misfitting belt holes. Instead, our unique spring-loaded, ratchet buckle interfaces with a hidden track sewn into the back of the leather belt, to provide over 40+ micro adjustment points. This means you can adjust your belt 1/4" at a time for the perfect fit all day. It\'s a simple, secure system that will forever change the way you think about belts. How the belt is measured:  When the strap is around your waist (and through your belt loops), how much extra is there? That\'s how much you should cut. How to trim:  Make sure you cut the raw end that was inserted into the buckle, please cut less than you think you need to at first since you can cut more. How it works:  1. To remove your belt: Pull and hold the release lever, and then slide the strap out of the buckle. 2. If the belt is too tight: With the left hand index finger, pull and hold lever away from body, meanwhile relieve tension by pushing strap toward buckle with the right hand.  Packing list: Belt*1 Buckle*1 Gift Box*1']
